io.spine.server.projection

Class ProjectionRepository<I,P extends Projection<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.Repository<I,E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.RecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
        • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultRecordBasedRepository<I,E,S>
          • io.spine.server.entity.EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
            • io.spine.server.projection.ProjectionRepository<I,P,S>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of IDs of projections
    P - the type of projections
    S - the type of projection state messages
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.logging.Logging, MessageDispatcher<io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,java.util.Set<I>>, MulticastDispatcher<io.spine.core.EventClass,io.spine.core.EventEnvelope,I>, Shardable, RepositoryView<I,P>, EventDispatcher<I>, ExternalDispatcherFactory<I>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class ProjectionRepository<I,P extends Projection<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends EventDispatchingRepository<I,P,S>
implements Shardable
    Abstract base for repositories managing Projections.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from class: Repository
        Closes the repository by closing the underlying storage.

        The reference to the storage becomes null after this call.

        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • onRegistered

        public void onRegistered()
        The callback called by a BoundedContext during the registration of the repository.

        If entities managed by this repository are versionable, registers itself as a type supplier with the Stand of the parent parent BoundedContext.

        Caches Column definitions of the Entity class managed by this repository.

        Registers itself with the EventBus of the parent BoundedContext.

        Ensures there is at least one event subscriber method (external or domestic) declared by the class of the projection. Throws an IllegalStateException otherwise.

        Overrides:
        onRegistered in class EventDispatchingRepository<I,P extends Projection<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

        protected RecordStorage<I> createStorage(StorageFactory factory)
        Description copied from class: Repository

        Implementations are responsible for properly calling the factory for creating the storage, which is compatible with the repository.

        Overrides:

      • findOrCreate

        protected P findOrCreate(I id)
        Loads an entity by the passed ID or creates a new one, if the entity was not found.

        An entity will be loaded despite its visibility. I.e. even if the entity is either archived or deleted, it is loaded and returned.

        The new entity is created if and only if there is no record with the corresponding ID.

        Overrides to expose the method to the package.

        Overrides:
        findOrCreate in class RecordBasedRepository<I,P extends Projection<I,S,?>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the entity to load
        Returns:
        the entity with the specified ID

      • getEndpointDelivery

        @SPI
protected ProjectionEventDelivery<I,P> getEndpointDelivery()
        Defines a strategy of event delivery applied to the projections managed by this repository.

        By default uses direct delivery.

        Descendants may override this method to redefine the strategy. In particular, it is possible to postpone dispatching of a certain event to a particular projection instance at runtime.

        Returns:
        delivery strategy for events applied to the instances managed by this repository

      • getShardingStrategy

        public ShardingStrategy getShardingStrategy()
        Description copied from interface: Shardable
        Defines the strategy of the sharding.

        In particular, sets the rules on which message destination belongs to which shard.

        Specified by:
        getShardingStrategy in interface Shardable
        Returns:
        the strategy of sharding for this Shardable
